Class Item

java.lang.Object
Item
public class Item extends Object
Item ojetcs store the ammount of 1 of 6 items

Example Use: 
 
      Pet p = new Pet("savefile.csv", 1)
      Item i = new Item("savefile.csv", 1, 0, 1, p);
      System.out.println(Item.getType());
Example Output:1

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String filename, int lineNum, int catagory, int type, Pet pet)
      Item constructor. Creates a new Item object.
      Parameters:
      filename - The save file containing item to be loaded
      catagory - The catagory of the item, gift or food
      type - The type of the item, 1 of 3 for each catagory
      pet - The pet that the item is to be used on
      lineNumber - Line number of item to be loaded
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        Pet.java
      • invalid reference 
        calcIncrease()

      public boolean isUsable(Pet pet)
      Determine if the item is usable based on the pet state.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet that the item is to be used on
      Returns:
      True if is usable, false otherwise
